heading: The Instagrammable Dubai | Couple Special

itinerary.day1Heading: Arrival in Dubai | Welcome to the City Of Gold
itinerary.day1Overview: The driver will pick you up from Dubai Airport and transfer you to your hotel. After check-in, you can relax or explore the local neighborhood around your hotel. Later in the evening, the driver will take you to the Dubai Marina for Dhow Cruise. Take in the views of the Dubai skyline while cruising along the Dubai Marina. Savor a delicious buffet with Arabic dishes and enjoy live shows. Post-cruise, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day2Heading: Dubai Sightseeing Tour | Visit the Burj Khalifa
itinerary.day2Overview: The driver will pick you up from your hotel and take you on a half-day sightseeing tour of Dubai. Admire Dubai's iconic landmarks including Jumeirah Beach, Atlantis Hotel, and Jumeirah Mosque. Afterward, visit the Dubai Mall and head towards Dubai Aquarium to see over 33,000 aquatic creatures. Later, head to Burj Khalifa and take stunning photos of the city from the 124th & 125th floors. Return back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day3Heading: Dubai Dolphinarium & Desert Safari | Adventure in Dubai's golden dunes
itinerary.day3Overview: The driver will pick you up from the hotel and take you to Dubai Dolphinarium. Enjoy an amazing performance by the dolphins as they showcase their incredible skills and perform tricks. Afterwards, enjoy a thrilling Desert Safari with dune bashing, sandboarding, and camel ride. After the activities, indulge in a scrumptious BBQ dinner in the deserts of Dubai while enjoying amazing live shows. Later, return back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day4Heading: Dubai Frame and AYA Universe | Dubai Delights
itinerary.day4Overview: The driver will pick you up from your hotel and take you to Dubai Frame. Marvel at the panoramic views of Dubai's skyline from the Dubai Frame's observation deck. Then, visit AYA Universe, with twelve immersive experiences including Flora, Outland, and The River. After your visit, get transferred back to your hotel for an overnight stay.

itinerary.day5Heading: IMG Worlds of Adventure | Visit Dubai's Largest Indoor Theme Park
itinerary.day5Overview: The driver will pick you up from your hotel and transfer you to IMG Worlds of Adventure, Dubai's largest indoor theme park. Explore the six themed zones at the park and enjoy adrenaline-pumping rides and meet iconic superheroes & beloved cartoon characters at the park. After your visit, the driver will transfer you back to your hotel for an overnight stay in Dubai.

itinerary.day6Heading: Departure | Take a bag full of memories to cherish for eternity
itinerary.day6Overview: Pack your bags and check out from your hotel in Dubai. The driver will pick you up from the hotel and drop you off at Dubai Airport (DXB) as your trip comes to an end.

overView.heading: Discovering Dubai: A Fusion of Tradition and Luxury
overView.text: Embark on an enchanting journey to Dubai, where tradition intertwines seamlessly with luxury. Explore the cultural heritage, extravagant landmarks, and opulent lifestyle, creating a captivating blend of past and present.

overView.heading: Iconic Wonders of Old Dubai
overView.text: Unravel the historical marvels of Old Dubai. Wander through ancient souks, marvel at majestic mosques, and absorb the rich heritage of this vibrant district, echoing tales of Bedouin tribes and pearl divers.

overView.heading: Modern Marvels in New Dubai
overView.text: Experience the futuristic skyline of New Dubai. Marvel at towering skyscrapers, indulge in luxury shopping, and immerse yourself in the cosmopolitan allure of the city, where innovation meets extravagance.

overView.heading: Nature's Oasis: Dubai Miracle Garden
overView.text: Escape into nature's beauty at Dubai Miracle Garden. Admire the colorful floral displays, stroll through themed gardens, and bask in the tranquility of this botanical paradise, offering a serene respite amidst the urban landscape.

overView.heading: Culinary Delights of Dubai
overView.text: Embark on a gastronomic adventure in Dubai. Indulge in diverse cuisines from around the world, from traditional Emirati dishes to international delights. Explore bustling food markets, savor exquisite flavors, and treat your taste buds to a culinary journey like no other.

overView.heading: Preserving Cultural Legacy
overView.text: Dubai is committed to preserving its cultural heritage. From heritage villages to art galleries, the city honors its roots while embracing modernity, offering a dynamic cultural experience for both residents and visitors alike.

overView.heading: Plan Your Dubai Exploration
overView.text: Whether drawn to history, luxury, or gastronomy, Dubai promises an unforgettable adventure. Plan your exploration of this dynamic city, where every corner reveals a story, and every moment is a celebration of Dubai's boundless charm.

visaPolicy: Visa Application Takes Minimum 4-5 Working Days for Issuance (Friday- Saturday immigration is closed - Subject To Immigration Approval)
Transit visa is valid for 14-days stay on and the Tourist visa is valid for 30-days stay. If passenger will stay more, penalty will be charged accordingly.
Client must travel within 7-10 days once visa is issued.
Cancellation for visa applications will be charged at an additional cost of USD 45/- per visa. We are not responsiat all in case of delayed and rejection of visa.
